name: Divination: Three runes
description:
Amazing rune divination! 

You can find out your future and get advice from the runes. Just shuffle the runes, close your eyes (or not ), ask your question and choose three random or favorite runes. And they will tell you everything! It doesn't matter if you are serious about fortune-telling or not. Because it's also a good way to have fun with friends or just relax after a hard day's work to the sound of falling runes. All the sounds are recorded from real runes.

A version for android will be soon.

Thanks for the help:
2D artist: Irina Krivosheeva https://www.artstation.com/rittby
Soundtrack composer: Vlad Kostarev kostarewlad@gmail.com 
Translation: Mosunova Mariia rikanova777@gmail.com
